mapper.insert: insert into edu values(#{username}, (select nvl(max(edu_no),100000)+1 from edu), #{edu_institute}, #{edu_start}, #{edu_end}, #{edu_category}, #{edu_major}, #{edu_grade} )
insert into career values(#{username}, (select nvl(max(career_no),600000)+1 from career), #{career_start} ,#{career_end}, #{career_institute},#{career_task},#{career_activity})
insert into lang values(#{username}, (select nvl(max(lang_no),500000)+1 from lang), #{lang_field} ,#{lang_testname}, #{lang_grade}, #{lang_getdate})
insert into license values(#{username}, (select nvl(max(license_no), 400000)+1 from license), #{license_name}, #{license_co}, #{license_getdate})
insert into portpolio values (#{username}, (select nvl(max(portpolio_no),200000)+1 from portpolio), #{portpolio_file} )
insert into skill values (#{username}, (select nvl(max(skill_no),700000)+1 from skill), #{skill_name})
insert into award values(#{username}, (select nvl(max(award_no),300000)+1 from award), #{award_name}, #{award_co}, #{award_year}, #{award_activity})
mapper.select: select username, edu_no, edu_institute, edu_start, edu_end, edu_category, edu_major, edu_grade from edu where username=#{username} order by edu_no asc
select username, career_no, career_start, career_end, career_institute, career_task, career_activity from career where username=#{username} order by career_no asc
select username, lang_no, lang_field, lang_testname, lang_grade, lang_getdate from lang where username=#{username} order by lang_no asc
select username, license_no, license_name, license_co, license_getdate from license where username=#{username} order by license_no asc
select username, award_no, award_name, award_co, award_year, award_activity from award where username=#{username} order by award_no asc
select pick_no, pick_code, intro_no, intro_lim from pick_intro where pick_code=#{pick_code} order by pick_no
